item.title: PsTools - Auto Accept EULA
item.description: When using or scripting anything from the PsTools suite it can sometimes be an inconvenience to have the EULA appear the first time you run any given tool on a system. In order to avoid this, simply append the /accepteula switch to your command and it will automatically accept and allow the script/command to run. pslist /accepteula
